name: Coconut Oil Face & Body Moisturizer 4oz
description: The Coconut Oil Face and Body Moisturizer is formulated to provide a shield against environmental aggressors, reducing premature signs of aging. With powerful natural antioxidant properties and hydration, this fast-absorbing oil will soothe, calm, and nourish skin. Use morning and night as part of your daily skincare routine or throughout the day as needed - on lightly damp skin after bathing for optimal absorption. Suitable for all skin types, our Coconut Oil Moisturizer works to relieve dryness and dehydration. Ingredients: Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Fragrance, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Oil, Orbignya Oleifera (Babassu) Seed Oil.
